'''Buffo Boffin''' was a Hobbit and patriarch of the [[Boffin Family]].

==History==
Buffo Boffin of [[the Yale]] married [[Ivy Goodenough]], and had four children: [[Bosco Boffin|Bosco]], [[Basso Boffin|Basso]], [[Briffo Boffin|Briffo]], and [[Berylla Baggins|Berylla]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
